channel.title: 100m RSGP GiveAway!
channel.description:
Augest 25th (My Birthday) I will be giving 100m to a random person!
How to join!
Post you RSN and say that you would like to join!
Thats all!
There will be 3 Winners!
Winner 1 will win 50m Winner 2 will win 25m winner 3 will win 25m!
Join today we have a limit of 100 Contestents!
Current Contestents! 1.gravenfire23 2.m.dog311 3.reyx7 4.ExtremeX-Scape™ 5.xxlukexx 6.TheCyberMan 7.Travas 8.TheHolyGrail 9.runewings317 10...::Coded::.. 11.OmgItsShane 12.IlikeArrays 13.*Removed Due to accusing of Scamming :/ 14.Pblord7 15.Speljohan 16.drubrkletern 17.T4_ 18.Phaze One 19.Mr.czar 20.mr pker01 21.Fire capez 22.TabbyKiller 23.rip4d 24.tregboarder 25.nicke924 26.Taharok 27.whip of soulz 28.jmood128 29.Jc22493 30.The Soul 31.theman321 32.blakeman8192
People Banned from Contending
tinyscape - Accusing of Scam/ Trolling Fridder- Showing Fake Pic of RS - RSPS Acc

item.title: 100m RSGP GiveAway!
item.dc:creator: @mod_taharok Taharok
item.description:
@mod_taharok wrote:

This happens all the time, honestly. The person claims to have money, people doubt him, then he’s all like “fuck you, I was trying to do something nice, here’s some proof.” It’s the same game over and over again. Stop falling for it.

Read full topic

[quote=“Kozs, post:150, topic:409020”][quote author=Davidi2 link=topic=510304.msg3704613#msg3704613 date=1312946969]
^ Unless of course he is doing as I suspect, and trying to find rich members to hack…

Anyway, when has anyone here seen a real give away where they don’t prove they have what it is first? Account give aways give pictures of the accounts etc. And just a picture of PART of an inventory means squat, it could easily be googled or from a RSPS.
[/quote]

Damn your a moron bro, dumb as hell and your like 14.[/quote]
If your 20 and you really still talk like that I feel bad for you.

item.title: 100m RSGP GiveAway!
item.dc:creator: @Vexillum Vexillum
item.description:
@Vexillum wrote:

[quote=“LordDeth, post:147, topic:409020”][quote author=Vexillum link=topic=510304.msg3704554#msg3704554 date=1312944513]

Why should he have to prove anything to you?
Either you follow what he says and you win money, or he’s lying and you’re no better off, that’s no reason to be a complete chode.

Well, I and probably many others do not like people that waste our time for nothing. He can post a little image of his money but I don’t get why he can’t get on and show us? Or like Fridder said post a pic of him at the new GE wearing it… that would be enough proof but for some reason he can’t do that.
[/quote]

If you don’t want to waste your time then go do something else, either that or stop complaining about something that you have no right to complain about. He’s going to give stuff away and you’re whining that he’s lying? So what if he is lying? It doesn’t hurt you at all.[/quote]

Not whining, I just like proving people wrong

Read full topic

item.title: 100m RSGP GiveAway!
item.dc:creator: @davidi2 Davidi2
item.description:
@davidi2 wrote:

[quote=“tinyscape, post:132, topic:409020”][quote author=Vexillum link=topic=510304.msg3704114#msg3704114 date=1312930351]

So when are you drawing.

I told you this like 50 times augest 25th

David your not just paranoid, your dumb too. I’m not asking for any information why/how could I hack someone.

You told me you were turning 20? Seems to me a 20 year old would know how to spell august. By the way… You remove me from the contest for asking you to show the cash? I simply said show me the cash and you say “Ohh, no too many bots up and I would lag even more.” This is suspicious to me… I don’t get how he could hack anyone but maybe he is just doing it because he got bored of playing with his dick every day.
[/quote]It’s all fake, all he wants is your account to steal all your earned cash. I want proof that you really do have 100m[/quote]Exactly.

I’m not saying that knowing your RSN means he can immediately hack you, but it makes me suspicious and to me it seems like an excellent way to find and target richer members.

Read full topic
